outputs.output_descr: The programme was designed to support the deepening of Ethiopia's democratisation process.  It supports the exercise of political, economic and adminitrative authority to manage the nation's affairs by ensuring a) participation of citizens in the affairs of the  state; b) empowerment , expecially of women; c) maintenance of peaceful conditions and e) efficient and equitable allocation and effective utilization of the country's resources.  The institutions supported by this progreamme included  Ethiopian Human Rights Commission, Ethiopian Institution of Ombdusman, National Election Board, JSRP, Parliament & EIIPD.

project_descr: Strengthening the Capacity of Key Democratic Governance Institutions
